languages.text: "Ну уж нет! Я в ту сторону ни ногой. Никакая пожива не стоит того, чтобы снова столкнуться с тем безумцем".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Из мово плеча достаны… А ты не зырь! Мои они, кровью моей оплочены!"

languages.text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."
languages.original_text: "Ну уж нет! Я в ту сторону ни ногой. Никакая пожива не стоит того, чтобы снова столкнуться с тем безумцем".

traits.locale_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic for the second time."
"Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic for the second time."
"Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."
"Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."
"Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."
"Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

languages.text: "Auf keinen Fall! Ich geh da nicht raus. Keine Beute ist es wert, diesem Spinner ein zweites Mal zu begegnen."
languages.original_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

traits.locale_text: "Auf keinen Fall! Ich geh da nicht raus. Keine Beute ist es wert, diesem Spinner ein zweites Mal zu begegnen."

languages.text: « Pas question de risquer ma peau pour ça ! Y a rien qui vaut la peine de tomber sur ce cinglé une deuxième fois. »
languages.original_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

traits.locale_text: « Pas question de risquer ma peau pour ça ! Y a rien qui vaut la peine de tomber sur ce cinglé une deuxième fois. »

languages.text: “没门！我绝对不去！万一撞上那个疯子怎么办？哪怕是再值钱的东西，也不值得冒这个险。”
languages.original_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

traits.locale_text: “没门！我绝对不去！万一撞上那个疯子怎么办？哪怕是再值钱的东西，也不值得冒这个险。”

languages.text: «¡Ni de broma! No pienso salir ahí fuera. No hay botín que valga volver a enfrentarse a ese lunático».
languages.original_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ni de broma! No pienso salir ahí fuera. No hay botín que valga volver a enfrentarse a ese lunático».

languages.text: 「絶対に無理です！私は行きませんよ！あんな狂人に二度も会うなんて、どんな報酬をもらったって割に合いません」
languages.original_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

traits.locale_text: 「絶対に無理です！私は行きませんよ！あんな狂人に二度も会うなんて、どんな報酬をもらったって割に合いません」

languages.text: "Hadi oradan! Dışarı çıkmam ben. Hiçbir ganimet, o kaçıkla bir kez daha karşı karşıya gelecek olmaya değmez."
languages.original_text: "Not a chance! I am not going out there. No loot is worth facing that lunatic a second time."

traits.locale_text: "Hadi oradan! Dışarı çıkmam ben. Hiçbir ganimet, o kaçıkla bir kez daha karşı karşıya gelecek olmaya değmez."
